author: bmanikm
body:
Change details:
- Added metadata to the PowerShellGet.psd1
- Updated the ModuleVersion to 1.1.0.0 (#2136)
- Fixed special chars in PSGet.Resource.psd1
- Catalog signing verification changes from Windows Source Depot

comments.author: msftclas
comments.body:
Hi **@bmanikm**, I'm your friendly neighborhood Microsoft Pull Request Bot (You can call me MSBOT). Thanks for your contribution! You've already signed the contribution license agreement. Thanks!

The agreement was validated by Microsoft and real humans are currently evaluating your PR.

TTYL, MSBOT;

comments.author: kilasuit
comments.body: Please update the Module Version in the Manifest before you merge this in relation to #2136

title: [PowerShellGet] Merging the changes from Windows Source Depot.
